pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, September 22, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

New York City, United States of America

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Ottawa.

Closed to media

National Capital Region, Canada

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Ottawa.

Closed to media

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks in the House of Commons to commemorate the 50th anniversary of the 1972 Summit Series.

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.
